verses.verse: And he heard<WH8085> the words<WH1697> of Laban<WH3837>'s sons<WH1121>, saying<WH559>, Jacob<WH3290> hath taken away<WH3947> all that was our father<WH1>'s; and of that which was our father<WH1>'s hath he gotten<WH6213> all this glory<WH3519>.
